title: Two-Faced: Part 1
description: Maysa Williams is dating the sexiest man she has ever seen, but she has a problem. During the day, he is charming and sweet; the perfect gentleman. Every night, he becomes a wildly passionate lover... but when it is daytime again, he acts like nothing has ever happened.It seems as if he is two completely different people in the one amazing body, and Maysa feels like she is going crazy. What will she do?This 6000 word short story contains hot, explicit sex, and is for adults only!
author: Mia Harris
